name: DataViz Companion
description:
This plugin is intended to work hand in hand with a full version of the Data Visualization Library


Feature Highlights

  • Live Preview and Code Export.
  • JSFiddle integration.
  • Easy Color Style Customization.
  • and much more...


Features Planed

  • Multiple Chart Library support (allows switching for targeted front end chart libraries).
  • Support more chart types.
